explanation: [0-0] Ronaldinho, wearing a white shirt, black pants, and a black hat, is standing outdoors with several staff members wearing ID cards. In the background, there is a backdrop with a church building printed on it and a yellow wall. There is a white "@FEARRON" watermark in the middle of the screen.

[0-6] Next, Ronaldinho walks forward. The scene switches to him standing on a green carpet with an orange soccer ball by his feet. In front of him, there is a goal and a humanoid signboard acting as a goalkeeper. He is surrounded by a circle of blue curtains and black nets. Outside the circle, there is a crowd and a long yellow building. A white subtitle "Ronaldinho" is displayed at the bottom of the screen. Ronaldinho lightly kicks the soccer ball forward with his right foot, hands behind his back. The humanoid signboard in front of the goal immediately falls to the right, blocking the ball from entering the goal. Then Ronaldinho tries again. He takes a run-up and kicks the ball with his right foot, sending it towards the goal. The signboard in front of the goal falls to the left, once again blocking the ball from going in. At the same time, a sweating emoji appears at the bottom of the screen, indicating Ronaldinho's failed attempt. The white and green letters "LY" appear on a black background in the upper left corner of the screen.

[6-10] Then the scene switches to a room with a gray background and a green mat on the floor. Messi, wearing a blue tracksuit and white sneakers, appears in the shot, followed by a group of men in various outfits. Messi runs quickly to the left and kicks the soccer ball on the ground with his right foot, sending it flying towards the goal. Then the signboard in front of the goal tilts to the right, blocking the flying ball. The ball hits the protective net next to it and falls to the ground. Messi also fails the challenge. The white subtitle "Messi" appears at the bottom of the screen.

[10-16] Subsequently, the scene switches to Griezmann, wearing a black top, jeans, and cream-colored shoes. In front of him, there is a red soccer ball and a goal blocked by a humanoid signboard. [16-25] Then the scene switches to a grassy area where a group of men in suits are walking towards the front. On the red sign above the picture are white subtitles. The white subtitle "Putin" appears at the bottom of the screen. Vladimir Putin, walking at the front, raises his hand to greet the people next to him. As the group of men advances, a tall red building can be seen in the background. Then the scene switches to Vladimir Putin, wearing a white shirt, standing in the middle, surrounded by a group of people. A little boy in a blue tracksuit and white socks places a red soccer ball in front of him. Vladimir Putin takes a few steps back and lifts his right foot to kick the ball towards the goal. The signboard quickly leans to the left, touches the ball, and the ball bounces into the goal. At the same time, the white subtitle "Mockba" appears on the blue sign above. Then the scene switches to Vladimir Putin, surrounded by the crowd, giving a high five and hug to the bald man in a white shirt and black suit pants who is walking out to the left, celebrating his success in the goal challenge.
